snippet: A panel accepted a prosecutor’s decision not to pursue accusations that President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner conspired to shield Iranians suspected of planning a 1994 bombing.
lead_paragraph: A panel accepted a prosecutor’s decision not to pursue accusations that President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner conspired to shield Iranians suspected of planning a 1994 bombing.

headline.main: Judges Close Conspiracy Case Against Argentina’s President
